In addition to his acting career, Swayze was also a talented singer-songwriter. He released an album, "Looking Into You," in 1990, which featured his rendition of the classic song "She's Like the Wind." He also performed on stage, starring in productions such as "Grease" and "Chicago."

Swayze's personal life was marked by a long-term relationship with actress Lisa Niemi, whom he married in 1975. He was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer in 2008 and passed away on September 14, 2009, at the age of 57. Throughout his life and career, Patrick Swayze was known for his charisma, talent, and generosity, leaving behind a lasting legacy in the entertainment industry.
